thread.title: Hillary Clinton to guest on Colbert's 'Late Show'
thread.title_full: Hillary Clinton to guest on Colbert's 'Late Show'

author: Tribune wire reports
title: Hillary Clinton to guest on Colbert's 'Late Show'
text:
Hillary Clinton to guest on Colbert's 'Late Show' Hillary Rodham Clinton, Stephen Colbert Charles Dharapak / AP 
In this Thursday, April 17, 2008, file photo, Democratic presidential hopeful Sen. Hillary Rodham Clinton, D-N.Y., greets Stephen Colbert as she makes an appearance at a taping of Comedy Central's "The Colbert Report," in Philadelphia. 
In this Thursday, April 17, 2008, file photo, Democratic presidential hopeful Sen. Hillary Rodham Clinton, D-N.Y., greets Stephen Colbert as she makes an appearance at a taping of Comedy Central's "The Colbert Report," in Philadelphia. (Charles Dharapak / AP) Tribune wire reports Contact Reporter 
Hillary Rodham Clinton will pay a visit to "The Late Show With Stephen Colbert" on Tuesday. 
The Democratic presidential hopeful will be joined by other scheduled guests chief-TV-personality Anthony Bourdain and "Portlandia" star Carrie Brownstein, CBS said. 
Clinton follows past "Late Show" guests from the campaign trail including Jeb Bush, Bernie Sanders and Donald Trump. 
Associated Press
